descr.p: Functions to display dialogs to find and select records.

element.name: FindBotanicDlg
element.short: Show the find botanic taxon dialog

element.name: FindSiteDlg
element.short: Show the find dialog with gazetteer filters

element.name: FindTaxonKey
element.short: Show the find taxon dialog and return a key value to a variable

element.name: FindTaxonName
element.short: Show the find taxon dialog and return the name value to a variable
